Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I don't like the wording and phrasing taht AI uses, teachers are more approachable and better at translating compelx ideas into understandable concepts.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: More personal with a teacher and they know the subject better so are more useful.
